name: Coffee Apocalypse
description:
Coffee Apocalypse by Comb Studio. Which comprises of 4 students from Priestley College in Warrington UK. These are second year and students taking a Btec level 3 in Game Design. This is their first attempt at a Game Jam ran over 4 days. They were given the theme "Coffee Dreams Zombie Screams". They had 28 hours directed time to build it.

Description: A zombie gets his coffee stolen and you have to go through the level avoiding obstacles to get the coffee back. You upgrade yourself with other people's limbs and eat people to get your health back.

This is working Prototype, there maybe be bugs we plan to fix and an update will be available soon. This is what we had at the end of the Jam. Hope you enjoy.
